ActorTalk: The world's getting worse day by day...
Huh? Are you talking about this place?
Such an extravagant building! Who knows why they'd waste resources on something like this. Increasing the mission budget and improving battle supply are much more important!
And this sculpture... I have absolutely no idea what it's supposed to be.
What do those WGAA people even do all day?
(Are they just angry because they can't understand it...?)
